title: Top Drunkest Countries, Oz: Real Doctor, Real PoS 12.06.21
itunes:title: Top Drunkest Countries, Oz: Real Doctor, Real PoS 12.06.21
description:
In episode 1043, Jack and Miles are joined by writer and comedian Sam Morril to discuss Missouri GOP hates science so much they had to hide it from everyone, Who the Fuck is Dr. Oz?, The Annual Get Fucked Up Awards are here… and more!

  1. Missouri GOP hates science so much they had to hide it from everyone
  2. Who the Fuck is Dr. Oz?
  3. Dr. Oz Gave Dr. Oz Show Staff 15 Minutes’ Notice That He’s Quitting to Run for Senate in State Where He May Not Live
  4. The making of Dr. Oz
  5. Dr. Oz Hosts Joe Mercola On His Show. Does Oz Endorse Mercola's Anti-Vaccine Views?
  6. Dr. Oz touted Trump's Operation Warp Speed vaccine program in his US Senate campaign announcement
  7. The Annual Get Fucked Up Awards are here…


LISTEN: Evermore by Dirty Art Club

VISIT: sammorril.com

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
